name: HEXAGON EINSTEIN-ROSEN [CUBE EDITION]
description:
The incredibly popular 'Hexagon Einstein-Rosen' is back again with a new look.

Is the past, present and future simply an illusion?

Is all of time ever present and is free will just a figment of our imagination?

This piece will certainly have you asking these deep scientific questions.

Not only that, you are sent into the realm of the hypercube.

The Einstein-Rosen bridge is a speculative structure linking disparate points in spacetime. These 'wormholes', so to speak, are postulated to be projections of a fourth spatial dimension.

Art created: 02.08.2019
